DOCU_Docu.DOC:
These actions install, upgrade, remove and query installed packages on your Solaris host.
The actions are wrappers around the pkgadd, pkgrm, pkginfo command line tools.
=Supported versions=
See http://docs.automic.com/compatibility?len=Package.Solaris&comp=PCK.AUTOMIC_SOLARIS&version=1.0.0
=Rollback=
The actions getting some system information don't need rollbacks, because they do not change the state of your system. Such a method is QUERY.
Actions potentially changing the state of your system (INSTALL, REMOVE) do not have rollbacks defined yet.
